settings.title: Our Benefits
settings.text: You requested better grip socks, so we took action.

settings.title: Prevent Falls On Slippery Surfaces
settings.text: Whether youâ€™re at home, in the hospital or running around a nursing home chasing down escaping grandmas, these super sticky grip socks will make sure nobody on the go accidentally falls on their face. No one likes taking their loved ones into the ER for preventable falls! Look no further than these hospital grip socks to prevent slippage year round.

settings.title: Designed With Comfort In Mind
settings.text: We searched high and low for quality material because your little toesies deserve nothing but the best. Made from natural bamboo and cotton, these hospital grip socks are durable with full padded cushion. The stretchy fabric ensures easy slip-on with a wide top. We also made sure to avoid having an annoying toe seam.

settings.title: Look Good To Feel Good
settings.text: Not only are these hospital grip socks useful, but their designs will have you giggling all day long. Got a loved one who has to spend some time in the hospital? Brighten up their day with these fun and one of a kind hospital grip socks.
